languages.text: {n}Слова женщины тонут в нарастающей головной боли: раздражение, презрение, разочарование, подобно трехвостой плети, стегаю ваш разум сотней {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}злобных шепотов{/d}{/n}: "Время рассвета почти настало, а ты так и не сумел{mf||а} сделать правильный выбор на перепутье судьбы! Истина, что скрывает от незрячих приспешников труп на троне, могла озарить твой взор, даровать... безграничную свободу. Но ты оказал{mf|ся|ась} слаб{mf||а}. Не стал{mf||а} бороться, не стал{mf||а} слушать... Дитя, недостойное Истины. {mf|Слепец|Заблудшая}, недостойн{mf|ый|ая} свободы!" {n}Чужое присутствие растворяется в мыслях липким осадком, более не желая нести свое слово подобно{mf|му|ой} вам.{/n}

{n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte der Frau verschwimmen angesichts deiner Kopfschmerzen: Verwirrung, Verachtung und Enttäuschung wüten in deinem Kopf wie eine dreischwänzige Peitsche und Hunderte {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}wütende Stimmen{/d}{/n}: "Die Zeit der Dämmerung naht, und Ihr habt es versäumt, am Kreuzweg des Schicksals die richtige Wahl zu treffen! Die Wahrheit, die den blinden Schergen des Leichenimperators verborgen ist, hätte Euren Blick erhellen und Euch ... grenzenlose Freiheit gewähren können. Aber Ihr habt Euch als schwach erwiesen. Ihr wolltet weder kämpfen, noch zuhören ... Wie ein Kind, das der Wahrheit nicht würdig ist. {mf|Ein blinder Junge|Ein verlorenes Mädchen}, der Freiheit unwürdig!" {n}Die außerirdische Präsenz weicht aus deinem Bewusstsein wie zäher Schleim, als wäre sie nicht länger bereit, Zeit mit jemanden wie dir zu vergeuden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

Die Wahrheit, die den blinden Schergen des Leichenimperators verborgen ist, hätte Euren Blick erhellen und Euch ... grenzenlose Freiheit gewähren können. Aber Ihr habt Euch als schwach erwiesen. Ihr wolltet weder kämpfen, noch zuhören ... Wie ein Kind, das der Wahrheit nicht würdig ist. {mf|Ein blinder Junge|Ein verlorenes Mädchen}, der Freiheit unwürdig!" {n}Die außerirdische Präsenz weicht aus deinem Bewusstsein wie zäher Schleim, als wäre sie nicht länger bereit, Zeit mit jemanden wie dir zu vergeuden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de la femme sont noyées par la migraine qui vous enserre le crâne : irritation, mépris et déception vous fouaillent la cervelle tel un fouet à trois queues, accompagnés d'une nuée de {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}murmures furieux{/d}{/n} : « L'aube approche à grands pas et vous n'avez pas su faire le bon choix à la croisée des destins ! La vérité dissimulée aux regards aveugles des larbins de l'Empereur-Cadavre aurait pu illuminer votre vie et vous octroyer... une liberté sans limites, si seulement vous n'aviez pas fait preuve d'une telle faiblesse. Vous avez refusé de vous battre et vous avez fait la sourde oreille... {mf|tel un|telle une} enfant indigne de la vérité. Vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un petit garçon aveugle|une petite fille perdue} qui ne mérite pas d'être libre ! » {n}La présence étrangère se dissipe et reflue de votre esprit, refusant de gaspiller davantage sa salive avec quelqu'un comme vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

La vérité dissimulée aux regards aveugles des larbins de l'Empereur-Cadavre aurait pu illuminer votre vie et vous octroyer... une liberté sans limites, si seulement vous n'aviez pas fait preuve d'une telle faiblesse. Vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un petit garçon aveugle|une petite fille perdue} qui ne mérite pas d'être libre ! » {n}La présence étrangère se dissipe et reflue de votre esprit, refusant de gaspiller davantage sa salive avec quelqu'un comme vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その女性の言葉は、あなたの頭痛の高まりによってかき消される。苛立ち、軽蔑、失望が三つ尾の鞭のようにあなたの心をかき乱し、さらには数多の{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}怒りの囁き{/d}も付随する。{/n}「夜明けの時がもうすぐそこまで来ている。それなのに、お前は運命の岐路で正しい選択をすることができなかったのだ！死体の皇帝の手先たちから隠されている真実は、お前の視界を照らし…限りない自由を与えたかもしれない。だが、お前は弱かった。戦おうとせず、言葉を聞かず…お前は真実にふさわしくない子だったのだ。自由に値せぬ者だったのだ！」{n}異質な存在は、ねばつくヘドロのようにあなたの意識から溶け去った。それはもはや、あなたに言葉をかけようとはしなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de la mujer se pierden en tu creciente dolor de cabeza: la irritación, el desdén y la decepción azotan tu mente como un látigo de tres colas, acompañados de un centenar de {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}susurros furibundos{/d}{/n}: «¡La hora del amanecer se cierne sobre nosotros y has tomado la decisión errónea en la encrucijada del destino! La Verdad, oculta a los esbirros ciegos del emperador cadáver, podría haber agraciado tus ojos, haberte otorgado... una libertad ilimitada. No obstante, has demostrado tu debilidad. No lucharás, no obedecerás... eres un{mf||a} niñ{mf|o|a} indign{mf|o|a} de la Verdad. ¡Un{mf||a} muchach{mf|o|a} perdid{mf|o|a}, indign{mf|o|a} de la libertad!». {n}La presencia ajena se desvanece de tu consciencia como un lodo pegajoso, negándose a desperdiciar una palabra más en alguien como tú.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de la mujer se pierden en tu creciente dolor de cabeza: la irritación, el desdén y la decepción azotan tu mente como un látigo de tres colas, acompañados de un centenar de {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}susurros furibundos{/d}{/n}: «¡La hora del amanecer se cierne sobre nosotros y has tomado la decisión errónea en la encrucijada del destino! La Verdad, oculta a los esbirros ciegos del emperador cadáver, podría haber agraciado tus ojos, haberte otorgado... una libertad ilimitada. No obstante, has demostrado tu debilidad. No lucharás, no obedecerás... eres un{mf||a} niñ{mf|o|a} indign{mf|o|a} de la Verdad. ¡Un{mf||a} muchach{mf|o|a} perdid{mf|o|a}, indign{mf|o|a} de la libertad!». {n}La presencia ajena se desvanece de tu consciencia como un lodo pegajoso, negándose a desperdiciar una palabra más en alguien como tú.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听不清那个女人在说什么，她的话被你愈发强烈的头痛吞没了。恼怒、蔑视与失望，仿佛鞭子一般抽打着你的意识。成百上千个{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}愤怒的低语声{/d}在你脑中交织，回响。{/n}“黎明即将来临，可你却没能在命运的十字路口做出正确的选择！尸皇的仆从对真理视而不见，真理本可以照亮你的前路，赐予你……无限的自由，可你实在是太软弱了。你不愿奋起战斗，不肯听从真理的指引……你如同盲童一样，不配得到真理，不配获得自由！”{n}来自异界的实体仿佛粘稠的淤泥一样，从你的意识中彻底消失，不愿继续在你这样的人身上浪费时间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's words are drowned out by your growing headache: irritation, contempt, and disappointment rack your mind like a three-tailed whip, accompanied by a hundred {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}furious whispers{/d}{/n}: "The time of daybreak is almost upon us, and you have failed to make the correct choice at the crossroads of fate! The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth. A {mf|blind boy|lost girl} unworthy of freedom!" {n}The alien presence melts away from your awareness like sticky sludge, no longer willing to waste its word on one such as you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şiddetlenen baş ağrın, kadının sözlerini bastırıyor. Zihnini acıdan kıvrandıran iğrenme, nefret ve hayal kırıklığı duygularına yüzlerce {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}öfkeli fısıltı{/d} eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Tan vakti yaklaşmış, sense kaderin kavşağında doğru seçimi yapmaktan âciz kalmışsın! Ceset imparatorun âmâ kölelerinden saklı olan Hakikat, yolunu aydınlatabilir ve sana... Sınırsız özgürlük tanıyabilirdi. Fakat sen zayıflığını gösterdin. Mücadele etmedin, dinlemedin... Hakikat'e layık olmayan bir çocuksun. Hürriyeti hak etmeyen, {mf|kör bir oğlansın|kayıp bir kızsın}!" {n}Tuhaf hissiyat, yapışkan bir tortu tabakası gibi eriyip bilincinden kayıveriyor. Sözlerini senin gibi biri için heba etmek istemiyor.{/n}

The Truth that is hidden from the unseeing minions of the corpse emperor could have illuminated your sight, granted you... boundless freedom. But you proved to be weak. You would not fight, you would not listen... A child unworthy of the Truth.
